title: First contentful paint
summary: First Contentful Paint (FCP) is when the browser renders the first bit of content from the DOM, providing the first feedback to the user that the page is actually loading. The question "Is it happening?" is "yes" when the first contentful paint completes.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
